Package org.apache.fop.afp.goca

Contains a collection of AFP font related classes.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AbstractGraphicsCoord A base class encapsulating the structure of coordinate based GOCA objects
AbstractGraphicsDrawingOrder A base GOCA drawing order
AbstractGraphicsDrawingOrderContainer A base container of prepared structured AFP objects
GraphicsAreaBegin The beginning of a filled region (graphics area).
GraphicsAreaEnd The end of a filled region (graphics area).
GraphicsBox A GOCA graphics rectangular box
GraphicsChainedSegment A GOCA graphics segment
GraphicsCharacterString A GOCA graphics string
GraphicsData A GOCA graphics data
GraphicsEndProlog The end of a prolog.
GraphicsFillet A GOCA graphics curved tangential line to a specified set of straight lines drawn from the given position or current position
GraphicsFullArc A GOCA graphics arc (circle/ellipse)
GraphicsImage A GOCA Image
GraphicsLine A GOCA graphics straight line drawn from the given absolute position
GraphicsSetArcParameters Sets the arc parameters for a GOCA graphics arc (circle/ellipse)
GraphicsSetCharacterSet Sets the current character set (font) to be used for following graphics strings
GraphicsSetCurrentPosition Sets the current painting position of the graphics object
GraphicsSetFractionalLineWidth Sets the line width to use when stroking GOCA shapes (structured fields)
GraphicsSetLineType Sets the value of the current line type attribute when stroking GOCA shapes (structured fields)
GraphicsSetLineWidth Sets the line width to use when stroking GOCA shapes (structured fields)
GraphicsSetMix Sets the foreground mix mode.
GraphicsSetPatternSymbol Sets the pattern symbol to use when filling following GOCA structured fields
GraphicsSetProcessColor Sets the current processing color for the following GOCA structured fields
 

Package org.apache.fop.afp.goca Description

Contains a collection of AFP font related classes.
